title: Contemporary Harmony in Swidnica’s Historic Center
description: This minimalist Scandinavian house blends inviting open spaces with clean design. The home offers 3 well-proportioned bedrooms and 2 airy bathrooms across 137 sqm, perfect for long-term comfort. A cozy living area, complete with a calming fireplace, connects effortlessly with a modern kitchen. Every zone has been designed for accessibility and ease, with thoughtful considerations such as wide corridors and step-free transitions. The property is topped off by a large underground garage with ample space for vehicles and bicycles.
neighborhood_description: Situated in Swidnica’s Historic Center, you are surrounded by architecture steeped in heritage and lively cultural atmosphere. Daily routines are simplified with convenient public transport and highway access, placing both city amenities and scenic escapes within easy reach. The district’s bike-friendly incentives further encourage an active, balanced lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: prime access to local culture and cafes
target_buyer: Ideal for long-term renters or families desiring a stable, accessible living space near vibrant city life but away from daily bustle.
market_positioning: Unites elegant Scandinavian minimalism with practical modern amenities in Swidnica’s distinguished core. This property is positioned as an accessible, future-oriented home in a competitive local market, tailored to those seeking lasting comfort and connected urban living.
